name: Stunt Limo: Driving Simulator
description:
Stunt Limo Driving Simulator is an exciting Free-Roaming Driving Game. Go anywhere you want in the sandbox arena whilst collecting fuel and health Pick-ups to keep your limo going, your fuel is always running down so find as much as you can.

The Pick-ups are hidden everywhere around the arena, take on the obstacles and challenge games including Football and Bowling as you try to find them all! Earn stunt score as you drive around by performing jumps and drifts.

Think you can master all of the obstacles and challenges in the arena?
